verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hide me now
Under Your wings
Cover me
Within Your mighty hand

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
When the oceans rise and thunders roar
I will soar with You above the storm
Father you are King over the flood
I will be still, know You are God

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Find rest my soul
In Christ alone
Know His power
In quietness and trust
